data.title: Availability of Apple Media Services
data.meta_description: Learn if you can buy apps, movies, music, books, and more, or use Apple media services, in your country or region.
data.text:
Learn if you can buy apps, movies, music, books, and more, or use Apple media services, in your country or region.

Depending on your country or region, you might not be able to buy, download, or subscribe to certain types of media. The availability and features of certain apps, movies, and more can vary. If you think an app or other media should be available in your country or region, contact the developer or publisher directly.

Find your country or region below to see what's available to you.

To find out what payment methods are accepted in the App Store or other stores, see what payment methods you can use in your country or region.

United States and Canada

Latin America and the Caribbean
